original_text: And the fear of the Lord fell upon all the kingdoms of the lands that were around Judah, and they made no war against Jehoshaphat.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다 사방의 모든 나라에 두려움을 주사 여호사밧과 싸우지 못하게 하시매

sentences.original_text: And the fear of the Lord
fell upon all the kingdoms of the lands
and they made no war against Jehoshaphat
